title: Trying to find Justin Menking
content:
Has anyone heard from Justin Menking? I saw a posting .. or connection to this website.. adn I’m now trying to track him down..

I believe I worked with his father, Clare Menking, many years ago at the Archbishop Sheen Center in Dallas, Texas. If that is him, it is OK to give him my email address or phone. I know his Mom well and would love to be able to talk to her again.. and to also catch up with Justin.

Patricia Martin  
Martin Media (972) 333-6722  
 [martinmm@verizon.net](mailto:martinmm@verizon.net)  
martinmm.com

 [‹ Frutiger Rip Off](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162930/http:/typophile.com/node/18262 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lost link – FOUND!!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162930/http:/typophile.com/node/50376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: martinmm

comments.content:
Hi Patricia,

you can try contacting him [via his profile page](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162930/http:/typophile.com/user/26739).  
You might reconsider making your email address publicly available, unprotected – you run the risk of it being harvested by spam bots.  
F
